sentences.translation: I waited for him for many years.

sentences.simplifiedText: 经过多年的辛勤努力，他的公司终于取得了重大的成功。
sentences.traditionalText: 經過多年的辛勤努力，他的公司終於取得了重大的成功。
sentences.pinyin: Jīngguò duōnián de xīnqín nǔlì, tā de gōngsī zhōngyú qǔdéle zhòngdà de chénggōng.
sentences.translation: After years of hard work, his company finally achieved great success.

sentences.simplifiedText: 尽管他们有多年的工作经验，但他们仍然每天都学习新的东西。
sentences.traditionalText: 儘管他們有多年的工作經驗，但他們仍然每天都學習新的東西。
sentences.pinyin: Jǐnguǎn tāmen yǒu duōnián de gōngzuò jīngyàn, dàn tāmen réngrán měitiān dōu xuéxí xīn de dōngxī.
sentences.translation: Despite their longstanding work experience, they are still learning new things every day.
